column5: Hi Bruce,  On behalf of the 57 Children, their parents and myself, I would like to thank you and your son for coming out to our 15th Annual Willow Lake Fishing Derby and your generous donation of jigs and worm harnesses that you made. I have heard from some of the parents that they apperciated the time you guys spent explaining things to some of the kids. Again Bruce..... Thank you both very much.  Still working on the pics..Kelvin  Just wanted to let everyone know of this members comitment

I fished with Bruce and Rob Sunday Kelvin. Your right Bruce is a stand up guy. BTW his computer is dead so he might not see this. So if yourself or anyone else wishes to get ahold of him don't rely on your computer to do so.
Way to go Bruce and Rob Good gesture.
They don't come any better than Bruce!
They don't come any better than Bruce! I don't know Cliff ... you are also in the same category and there are many on here would agree

I fished with Bruce and Rob Sunday Kelvin. Your right Bruce is a stand up guy. BTW his computer is dead so he might not see this. So if yourself or anyone else wishes to get ahold of him don't rely on your computer to do so. Thanks for that info .. now I know why he has not been on for a while... I was starting to think something was wrong with his wife.....

Plus he's a busy man with all his canning etc. I have never met him but have been trying to get him out for a fish on Erie this year as my guest, weather and schedules haven't complied. Big Cliff and Big Ugli are cut from the same Big cloth.
